required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Hydrolyzed Collagen Combined With Djulis and Green Caviar Improve Skin Condition
clinical_study.official_title: Hydrolyzed Collagen Combined With Djulis and Green Caviar Improve Skin Condition

brief_summary.textblock: Collagen combined with djulis and green caviar improve skin condition

detailed_description.textblock: Using collagen drinks combined fish collagen with djulis, and green caviar to improve skin condition.

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using corneometer CM825 to examine skin moisture (The higher the value, the more water content, C.U., corneometer units )

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using cutometer dual MPA580 to examine skin elasticity (The closer the R2 value is to 1, the better the elasticity and no unit)

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using probe system GL2000 & MPA10 to examine skin gloss (The higher the value, the higher the gloss, no unit)

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: usig VISIA-CR to examine skin spot (The higher the value, the larger the pore area, mm2)

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using VISIOSCAN-VC20 to examine skin wrinkle (The higher the value, the more wrinkles, surface evaluation of wrinkles, SEW)

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using VISIOSCAN-VC98 to examine skin roughness (The higher the value, the higher the roughness, surface evaluation of roughness, SEr)

primary_outcome.time_frame: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 28 days
primary_outcome.description: using VISIOSCAN-VC98 to examine skin smoothness (The lower the value, the higher the smoothness, surface evaluation of smoothness, SEsm)

arm_group.description: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 14, 28 days
subjects drank 50 ml every night for 14, 28 days

intervention.description: subjects drank 50 ml every night for 14, 28 days
subjects drank 50 ml every night for 14, 28 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Dry skin
2. Rough skin
3. Large pores
4. Dark yellow complexion
5. Sagging skin
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Skin disorders
2. Liver diseases
3. Kidney diseases
4. Allergy to cosmetics, drugs, or foods
5. Pregnant and lactating women
6. People who had any cosmetic procedures before 4 weeks of the study
7. Area of facial spot over 3 cm2
8. Vegan
9. People who took collagen supplements in the past 3 months.

overall_official.affiliation: Research & Design Center, TCI CO., Ltd

facility.name: Research & Design Center, TCI CO., Ltd
